thread.title: Glenn E. Miller
thread.title_full: Lucky Tackle Box reviewed by Glenn E. Miller

author: Glenn E. Miller
title: Glenn E. Miller
text: I can tell you personally that LTB and especially Andrew Schwartz know what it is to give great customer support! I couldn't have asked for a better person to help me with my problem. Retiring from retail sales myself, I know what is involved with good customer service, and Andrew has made me a customer who will return to LTB for more!!
